alert.note: Alert for Baker; Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 02 at 4:18PM EST until December 02 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Baker County in northeastern Florida... West central Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 418 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glen St. Mary, or 16 miles north of Raiford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, and Sanderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
